00023 bool moreCmp( const util::istring &a, const util::istring &b ) {return a.length() > b.length();}
00024 }

00028 void FileFormat::write( const std::list<data::Image> &images, const std::string &filename, const util::istring &dialect ) throw( std::runtime_error & )
00029 {
00030     std::list<std::string> names = makeUniqueFilenames( images, filename );
00031     std::list<std::string>::const_iterator inames = names.begin();
00032     BOOST_FOREACH( std::list<data::Image>::const_reference ref, images ) {
00033         std::string uniquePath = *( inames++ );
00034 
00035         try {
00036             write( ref, uniquePath, dialect );
00037             LOG( Runtime, notice )
00038                     << "Image of size " << ref.getSizeAsVector() << " written to " <<  uniquePath
00039                     << " using " <<  getName() << ( dialect.empty() ?
00040                                                     util::istring() :
00041                                                     util::istring( " and dialect " ) + dialect
00042                                                   );
00043         } catch ( std::runtime_error &e ) {
00044             LOG( Runtime, warning )
00045                     << "Failed to write image to " <<  uniquePath << " using " <<  getName() << " (" << e.what() << ")";
00046         }
00047     }
00048 }

00050 bool FileFormat::hasOrTell( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &name, const isis::util::PropertyMap &object, isis::LogLevel level )
00051 {
00052     if ( object.hasProperty( name ) ) {
00053         return true;
00054     } else {
00055         LOG( Runtime, level ) << "Missing property " << name;
00056         return false;
00057     }
00058 }

00070 std::list< util::istring > FileFormat::getSuffixes( io_modes mode )const
00071 {
00072     std::list<util::istring> ret = util::stringToList<util::istring>( suffixes( mode ).c_str() );
00073     BOOST_FOREACH( util::istring & ref, ret ) {
00074         ref.erase( 0, ref.find_first_not_of( '.' ) ); // remove leading . if there are some
00075     }
00076     ret.sort( _internal::moreCmp ); //start with the longest suffix
00077     return ret;
00078 }
00079 
00080 std::pair< std::string, std::string > FileFormat::makeBasename( const std::string &filename )const
00081 {
00082     std::list<util::istring> supported_suffixes = getSuffixes();
00083     util::istring ifilename( filename.begin(), filename.end() );
00084     BOOST_FOREACH( const util::istring & suffix, supported_suffixes ) {
00085         size_t at = ifilename.rfind( suffix );
00086 
00087         if( at != ifilename.npos ) {
00088             if( at && ifilename[at - 1] == '.' )
00089                 at--;
00090 
00091             return std::make_pair( filename.substr( 0, at ), filename.substr( at ) );
00092         }
00093     }
00094     return std::make_pair( filename, std::string() );
00095 }
00096 
00097 std::string FileFormat::makeFilename( const util::PropertyMap &props, std::string namePattern )
00098 {
00099     boost::regex reg( "\\{[^{}]+\\}" );
00100     boost::regex regFormatInt( "%d_" ); // add leading zeros to int values - always as much as possible
00101     //NOTE: can also be done for rounding floats, but at the moment not required so not done right now
00102 
00103     boost::match_results<std::string::iterator> what;
00104     std::string::iterator pos = namePattern.begin();
00105 
00106 
00107     while( boost::regex_search( pos, namePattern.end() , what, reg ) ) {
00108 
00109         bool isFormatUsed = false;
00110         boost::cmatch m;
00111         size_t mSize = 1;
00112 
00113         if ( boost::regex_match( what[0].str().substr( 1, regFormatInt.size() ).c_str(), m, regFormatInt ) ) {
00114             mSize += regFormatInt.size();
00115             isFormatUsed = true;
00116         }
00117 
00118         util::PropertyMap::KeyType prop( what[0].str().substr( mSize, what.length() - 1 - mSize ).c_str() );
00119         const std::string::iterator start = what[0].first, end = what[0].second;
00120 
00121         if( props.hasProperty( prop ) ) {
00122             std::string pstring;
00123 
00124             if ( true == isFormatUsed ) {
00125                 size_t overallDigits = 0;
00126                 unsigned short tID = ( *props.propertyValue( prop ) ).getTypeID();
00127 
00128                 switch ( tID = ( *props.propertyValue( prop ) ).getTypeID() ) {
00129                 case util::Value<uint8_t>::staticID:
00130                     overallDigits = ceil( log10( std::numeric_limits<uint8_t>::max() ) );
00131                     break;
00132                 case util::Value<int8_t>::staticID:
00133                     overallDigits = ceil( log10( std::numeric_limits<int8_t>::max() ) );
00134                     break;
00135                 case util::Value<uint16_t>::staticID:
00136                     overallDigits = ceil( log10( std::numeric_limits<uint16_t>::max() ) );
00137                     break;
00138                 case util::Value<int16_t>::staticID:
00139                     overallDigits = ceil( log10( std::numeric_limits<int16_t>::max() ) );
00140                     break;
00141                 case util::Value<uint32_t>::staticID:
00142                     overallDigits = ceil( log10( std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max() ) );
00143                     break;
00144                 case util::Value<int32_t>::staticID:
00145                     overallDigits = ceil( log10( std::numeric_limits<int32_t>::max() ) );
00146                     break;
00147                 default:
00148                     break;
00149                 }
00150 
00151                 pstring =  boost::regex_replace( props.getPropertyAs<std::string>( prop ), boost::regex( "[[:space:]/\\\\]" ), "_" );
00152 
00153                 if ( 0 < overallDigits ) {
00154                     size_t zerosToFill = overallDigits - pstring.length();
00155                     pstring.insert( 0, zerosToFill, '0' );
00156                 }
00157             } else {
00158                 pstring =  boost::regex_replace( props.getPropertyAs<std::string>( prop ), boost::regex( "[[:space:]/\\\\]" ), "_" );
00159             }
00160 
00161             const size_t dist = start - namePattern.begin();
00162 
00163             namePattern.replace( start, end, pstring );
00164 
00165             pos = namePattern.begin() + dist + pstring.length();
00166 
00167             LOG( Debug, info )
00168                     << "Replacing " << util::PropertyMap::KeyType( "{" ) + prop + "}" << " by "   << props.getPropertyAs<std::string>( prop )
00169                     << " the string is now " << namePattern;
00170         } else {
00171             LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "The property " << util::MSubject( prop ) << " does not exist - ignoring it";
00172             namePattern.replace( start, end, "" ); // it must be removed, or it will match forever
00173         }
00174     }
00175 
00176     return namePattern;
00177 }
00178 
00179 std::list<std::string> FileFormat::makeUniqueFilenames( const std::list<data::Image> &images, const std::string &namePattern )const
00180 {
00181     std::list<std::string> ret;
00182     std::map<std::string, unsigned short> names, used_names;
00183     BOOST_FOREACH( std::list<data::Image>::const_reference ref, images ) {
00184         names[makeFilename( ref, namePattern )]++;
00185     }
00186 
00187     BOOST_FOREACH( std::list<data::Image>::const_reference ref, images ) {
00188         std::string name = makeFilename( ref, namePattern );
00189 
00190         if( names[name] > 1 ) {
00191             const unsigned short number = ++used_names[name];
00192             const unsigned short length = ( uint16_t )log10( ( float )names[name] ) - ( uint16_t )log10( ( float )number );
00193             const std::string snumber = std::string( length, '0' ) + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>( number );
00194             const std::pair<std::string, std::string> splitted = makeBasename( name );
00195             name = splitted.first + "_" + snumber + splitted.second;
00196         }
00197 
00198         ret.push_back( name );
00199     }
00200     return ret;
00201 }

00203 const float FileFormat::invalid_float = -std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity();
